REGISTER.TITLE: Registration
REGISTER.ACCEPT: I agree with the processing of my given data
REGISTER.TOAST_DUPLICATE: This email address is already in use
REGISTER.TOAST_INVALID_MAIL: No account was found for the given mail address
REGISTER.TOAST_INVALID_KEY: The activation key was already used or is invalid

DONE.TITLE: Almost ready
DONE.MAIL_INFO: We have sent you an e-mail to
DONE.MAIL_NOTE: Click on the link in the email to complete the registration or enter activation code.
DONE.NO_MAIL_INFO: Check your spam and junk E-Mail folders.
DONE.ACTIVATE_HINT: You received the activation code via e-mail

REQUEST.TITLE: Forgot log-in data?
REQUEST.INFO: Enter your e-mail address to assign a new password.
REQUEST.MAIL_NOTE: Click on the link in the email or enter activation code to set a new password.
